item.description:
After the crowds have gone home, we're planning to spend a couple of nights enjoying the magnificence of Myles Standish State Forest.

Sitting around a campfire toasting marshmallows and telling tall tales.

Running down to the pond for a quick dip during the day.

Hiking on demand.

Riding the bike trails from top to bottom and back.

Show off your kayaking skills.

Or just sitting around.

Join us.

We will get a group site down at Charge Pond for both Friday and Saturday nights. You can come for just one night or both.  There is a limit of 30 people and 8 vehicles on the site.  (The "group site" is actually a string of 4 individual sites and we can get 4 tents on each site.)

Bring your own camping gear and food. Reminder: No alcohol in Myles Standish State Forest.

Please indicate if you plan to stay Friday, Saturday or both.

We will be sharing the cost of the camping.   It cost us $59 total for the 2 nights.  ($25 per night plus a $9 fee.) Because of the upfront expenses, we are asking for a $10 deposit per tent.

We may have a group potluck cookout on Friday evening. If enough people sign up, any excess funds will go towards the campfire expenses (firewood, marshmallows, etc.) (If you can't use Paypal to make the deposit, please let us know and we will work something out.)

If the weather looks awful for the whole weekend, we will cancel. If just Friday night will be bad (or Saturday), we will keep the site available for the weekend.  If it is just typical iffy New England weather, we will go and demonstrate our Yankee stoicism.

These are the listings related to the campsite. They probably cover most of the questions you may have:

• Site Type: GROUP CAMPING • Site Reserve Type: Site-Specific • Checkin Time: 1:00 pm • Checkout Time: 11:00 am • Type of Use: Overnight • Min Num of People: 15 • Max Num of People: 30 • Pets Allowed: Domestic • Max Num of Vehicles: 8 • Driveway Surface: Gravel

• Driveway Entry: Back-In • Driveway Length: 30 • Max Vehicle Length: 30 • Campfire Allowed: Y • Fire Pit: Y • Looking For Category: Group Site • Picnic Table: Y • Privacy: Y
Within Facility
• Bicycling (Mountain) • Boating (Non-Motorized) • Comfort Station • Dumpster • Fishing • Hiking • Horse Camping • Horse Trails • Horseback Riding • Interpretive Programs • Picnicking • Showers • Swimming • Yurts


Please note that there are NO HOOKUPS for electric or water throughout this facility.
All sites in Charge Pond Area B are TENT, RV, or TRAILER depending on size.

In an effort to provide our campers with greater access to our group sites, reservations are limited to groups of not more than 30 individuals per site, per night. Upon arrival to the park, please be prepared to provide the names of each person staying at the group site. Also, please have available the make, model, color and license plate number of each vehicle. If bringing a pet, proof of rabies vaccination will be required at check-in.

 

The sites become available at 1PM on Friday. We will check-in then and open the site but feel free to come in whenever you can.
item.how_to_find_us: Group campsites are in Area B at Charge Pond.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Camp-out with the Friends of Myles Standish
